body.name: MAM Perfect Night Baby Pacifier, Patented Nipple, Glows in the Dark, 0-6 Months, Boy, 2 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 13 hrs 44 mins
features: GLOWS IN THE DARK: These night pacifiers for baby glow in the dark, making it easy for you to locate quickly at night without any stumbling and searching, so your baby can sleep better.
SYMMETRICAL DESIGN: The breastfeed SkinSoft pacifier for babies is fun and functional. The curved shield with wide openings are always right-side up and prevent skin irritation with maximum airflow.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 0-6 months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
FLEXIBLE SHAPE FOR 0-6 MONTH BABY : The nipple on these pacifiers for babies is 60% thinner and 4x more flexible than average, exerting less pressure on the mouth in order to avoid jaw deformations.

HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies, our 100% BPA & BPS free orthodontic silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort.
body.description: No more frustration trying to find your lost pacifiers at night! This pacifier glows in the dark, making it easy for baby and parent to find in the evening hours. Specially designed with your little one’s teeth and jaw in mind, the MAM Perfect Pacifier is clinically proven* to reduce the risk of open bite and increased overbite later in life. With a 60% thinner neck and 4 times more flexible nipple** than a regular pacifier, you can be assured that your little one’s favorite binky is safe for their development as it puts less pressure on their jaw and teeth. MAM’s medically engineered nipples feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple nipple and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested***. Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. Sterilize baby’s MAM pacifier in the microwave using the convenient MAM self-sterilizing storage case. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the pacifier case with the nipple facing down. Follow package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. *Y. Wagner, R. Heinrich-Weltzien, “Effect of a thinneck pacifier on primary dentition: a randomized controlled trial”, Orthodontics & Craniofacial Research, Volume 19, Issue 3, pages 127–136, August 2016. **Scientific reports from Wild Hi-Precision institute verify: the MAM Perfect’s teat neck is on average 60% thinner; test series by the University Clinic of Dentistry Vienna confirm: it is also on average 4 times more flexible than comparable pacifiers. (Between: 32% – 83% thinner / 1.1 – 19.5 times more flexible than regular silicone pacifiers). *** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Inspect carefully before each use. Pull the pacifier in all directions. Throw away at the first signs of damage or weakness. Only use dedicated pacifier holders tested to EN 12586. Never attach other ribbons or cords to a pacifier, your child may be strangled by them. Do not leave a pacifier in direct sunlight or near a source of heat or leave in sterilizing solution for longer than recommended, as this may weaken the nipple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Perfect Night Orthodontic Pacifier 2 Nighttime Glow-in-the-Dark Pacifiers MAM's BPA/BPS-free MAM Perfect Night Pacifiers have been developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 0-6 months*. MAM’s cutting-edge pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society Perfect nipple reduces the risk of misaligned teeth Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe Glow in the dark feature makes it easy for baby to find at night
Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Extra thin and flexible nipple allows room for teeth to grow SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Easy to find at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All my kids have LOVED these binkie's. They work so well, are super easy to clean, and I love that they glow in the dark. Makes it super easy for my kids to find them in their crib in the middle of the night. I love that it comes with a sanitizing box as well. Makes it super easy, and an easy place to store an extra one. Would recommend these to anyone. It always depends on the baby though. Some kids only like a certain kind. Worth trying though!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Babe loooves them
reviews.reviewText: Simple and effective. The only pacifier my girl will take.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only paci we use-
reviews.reviewText: Love the glow in the dark feature. We Love these pacis and have used them with both kiddos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This style of pacifier has been our favorite for both our kids! Tried a bunch with our first and this was the only style he would take.You can't go wrong with glow in the dark! These are all I buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby took right to it.
reviews.reviewText: Gift for great grandson.He came early, so did Binkies..Name looks amazing o

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality pacifier our son LOVES, but doesn't hold its "glow" very long.
reviews.reviewText: Overall these are as great as all other MAM products - high quality, adorable, and have been the favorite of our 4-month-old since we first started using them around 1 month.Unfortunately the glow-in-the-dark ones only really do so if you put them in bright sunlight for a long time (room lights don't seem to do the trick), and even then they only glow for a few hours at most, so I don't really see the whole "glow so your kid can find them in the middle of the night" thing working super well. Not to mention, what busy parent can remember/ prioritize remembering to stick them in a window to "charge" every morning? Not I, said the fly...So overall we love them, and it's fun when they have charged a bit and we get a glowy one for a while, but don't expect the glow to last overnight...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby’s favorite. Easy to find at night
reviews.reviewText: Small and easy for young baby to keep in mouth. Glow in the dark feature is great for night time use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars (-Mom of newborn) Love these!
reviews.reviewText: My son has used these pacifiers since he was born at the hospital and he’s done incredible with latching for feeding and taking bottles. At first, hospital provided a pacifier however when he was first born he did have to get used to latching so it was a bit difficult for him however these pacifiers were perfect starting out. Now wanting to order more!!
Excelente agarre y no lastima a los bebes
